select ,m.id mid,m.appealId mappealId,m.category mcategory,m.number mnumber,m.status mstatus,d.name mcategoryName,c.name typeName
left join company_material m on m.appealId =t.id LEFT JOIN portal_hqgj.dict c ON c.categoryId = 62 AND c.code = t.type LEFT JOIN portal_hqgj.dict d ON d.categoryId = 63 AND d.code = m.category where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
